ft.comm
Class ParallelPort

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.comm.CommPort
        |
        +--javax.comm.ParallelPort
              |
              +--ft.comm.ParallelPort
final class ParallelPort
extends javax.comm.ParallelPort

rudimentary parallel port for FischerTechnik. Makes parallel interface behave like serial interface.
